rules_applied: Rule 9: Convert anti-X to X-Targeted Antibody

Rituximab.reasoning: The abstract title did not contain a drug class for Rituximab, so the full abstract and search results were scanned. Multiple specific drug classes were identified in the search results. 'CD20-Directed Cytolytic Antibody' and 'CD20-Directed Antibody Interaction' were extracted from PubChem. 'CD20-Targeted Antibody' was derived from the 'anti-CD20 monoclonal antibody' description in StatPearls and the 'CD20 Antibody' mention in PubChem, following rules for target-modality hyphenation and conversion of 'anti-X' terminology.
